mapper.insert: INSERT INTO place.placetbl (p_name, p_location, p_description, p_thema, p_iname, p_views, p_stScore, p_price, x, y) VALUES (#{p_name}, #{p_location}, #{p_description}, #{p_thema}, #{p_iname}, #{p_views}, #{p_stScore}, #{p_price} , #{x}, #{y})
mapper.update: UPDATE place.placetbl SET p_name=#{p_name}, p_location=#{p_location}, p_description=#{p_description}, p_thema=#{p_thema}, p_iname=#{p_iname} WHERE p_id=#{p_id}
mapper.select:
SELECT p_id, p_name, p_location, p_stScore, p_iname FROM place.placetbl WHERE
p_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{region}, '%')

SELECT p_id, p_name, p_location, p_stScore, p_iname FROM place.placetbl WHERE
p_thema LIKE CONCAT('%', #{theme}, '%')
SELECT p_name, p_location, p_description, p_iname FROM place.placetbl WHERE p_location=#{location}
SELECT p_name, p_location, p_description, p_iname FROM place.placetbl WHERE p_thema=#{theme}
